Xref: cantaloupe.srv.cs.cmu.edu rec.sport.baseball.fantasy:2371 rec.sport.baseball:104329 Subject: Sid Fernandez? Distribution: usa Date: Thu, 15 Apr 1993 14:59:14 GMT Lines: 10
I read this morning that Sid Fernandez left last nights' game with stiffness in his shoulder. Does anyone have any information as to the extent of the injury (if indeed there is one), or weather the cold air in Colorado just got his joints a little stiff?
Thanks for the help... | Ray Miller | DISCLAIMER | | cub@chopin.jpl.nasa.gov | All opinions are strictly my own |
